title: Cord Cutting Meditation Release toxic relationship co-dependency: energetic independence, unhealthy attachments, own your energy, powerful assertiveness, spiritual parasites, psychic attack - Audiolibro - ThinkAndBloom - Storytel
author: Storytel AB
description: Do you feel drained by a relationship and want to release the toxic ties? Do you feel your boundaries are being pushed? Do you feel stuck in a connection and need to cut the invisible cords?
cleaned_text: - No calificado - 0 - Idioma - Inglés - Categoría [Desarrollo personal](/co/es/categories/12-Desarrollo-personal) - Duración - 6H 59M drained by a relationship and want to release the toxic ties? Do you feel your boundaries are being pushed? Do you feel stuck in a connection and need to cut the invisible cords? This Cutting Cords Guided Meditation is aimed at cutting the invisible toxic ties in a relationship. It could be family members, friends, co-workers, or intimate partners. It is particularly useful for those who are empaths or extra-sensitive to people's energies. It serves to protect us from further harm in our mental and emotional bodies. In this course, we will Disassociate your energetic cords Let go of the toxic relationship Own your power Release psychic attack Create powerful boundary Honor your sensitivities Protect body And much more After cutting the cords, you will feel calmer and re-balance
